mdRecord.dcterms:description: An Oakland residence built in 1911, which was designed by John Hudson Thomas who was influenced by Viennese Secessionists, a form of European Art Nouveau architecture. The home was commissioned by William Lovering Locke. -- http://oaklandwiki.org/Locke_House [work]
